answers.answer: Have they done an Echo or stress test on her?  You only mention an EKG and I would certainly think they would order more testing than that.

question: My mom is 62 years old and she just received her EKG and Chest reports today.EKG Result: Borderline T Wave Abnormalities..T/QRS ratio <1/20 or flat TChest Result: No active lung lesion is seen; The heart size is midly enlarged.My mom has minor stroke few years ago.  She has diabetes and High Blood pressure, taking medications.  Under control.  Should I take my mom to a cardiologist and have a full check?  So worry, pls answer, thank you.
title: Borderline ECG
